dawn.name: Cyrille
dawn.description: She’s a Bear Huntress, which means she gives bonuses related to Bear Hunt—like increasing Bear Hunt Rally capacity, giving Enhancement XP as rewards, boosting the number of Essence Stones you earn, and raising the troop deployment limit for Bear Hunts.

talent.name: Hunter's Heart
talent.description: Cyrille is a repository of bear-hunting skills and knowledge, increasing Bear Hunt Damage Points by 30% (effective for self only).

dawn.summarize:
Focus: Bear Hunt (PvE event)

Advantages:
Deals high damage, provides extra Rally Capacity, and grants gear XP bonuses.
Ideal for farming Bear Hunt and strengthening heroes/gear.

F2P Effectiveness: Very high
All skills can be utilized without purchasing premium items.

Spender Effectiveness: Medium

Spenders can unlock skills faster, but F2P players can remain effective as well.

priority skill F2P: 1.hunter's Heart, 2. Ursa's Bane, 3. Entrapment, 4. Weapon Master, 5. Scavenging

skills.name: Entrapment
skills.description: Increased Rally Capacity on Bear Hunt by 300,000, making it easier to gather troops.

skills.name: Scavenging
skills.description: Each Bear Hunt grants 5×100 Enhancement XP Components—effective for strengthening hero gear.

skills.name: Weapon Master
skills.description: Add 5 Essence Stones as a bonus per Bear Hunt—useful for upgrading gear.

skills.name: Ursa’s Bane
skills.description: Increases Troop Deployment Capacity during Bear Hunt by 30,000, helping to gather larger armies.

dawn.name: Agnes
dawn.description: She’s an “Elite Politician” and provides city-related buffs—like giving Seeker Chests when gathering, adding extra Intel missions, increasing stamina from the Storehouse, skipping a few hours of construction when starting an upgrade, and granting extra Mystery Badges from Daily Missions.

talent.name: Earthbreaker
talent.description: Agnes’s advanced drill machine can even indentify useful items buried near gathered resources. Gives 5 Seeker Chests every 120 gathering minutes (upto 30 chests daily, refreshing at 0:00 UTC)

dawn.summarize:
Focus: Economy & resources (gathering & daily missions)

Advantages:
Supports stamina regeneration, Intel Missions, chest gathering, and Mystery Badges.
Reduces building construction and upgrade times.

F2P Effectiveness: Medium-High

F2P players can gradually benefit economically, especially if they log in daily.

Spender Effectiveness: High

P2P players can maximize daily bonuses and drastically reduce construction times, allowing resources to develop faster.

priority skill F2P: 1.Earthbreaker, 2. Efficient Recon, 3. Optimization, 4. Covert Knowledge , 5. Project Management

skills.name: Efficient Recon
skills.description: Provides 8 additional Intel Missions per day, increasing the potential reward upgrade.

skills.name: Optimization
skills.description: Increasing the stamina regeneration of Patrick's cans by 40 points means an additional 80 stamina per day.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.description: Reduce new construction time by 8 hours per project—meaning up to 40 hours on a 5-stage building.

skills.name: Covert Knowledge
skills.description: Gives +120 Mystery Badges when completing daily missions and 4 free refreshes per day at the Mystery Merchant.

dawn.name: Romulus
dawn.description: Romulus is a military-type Expert who provides extra troop capacity, strengthens rallies, and gives daily Loyalty Tags bonuses.

talent.name: Commander Crest
talent.description: Commander Romulus is an expert at large deployments, increasing heroes expedition army size limit by 10.000.

dawn.summarize:
Focus: PvP & War Events (SVS, Rally, Expedition)

Advantages:
Increases Troop Capacity, Rally Capacity, and daily Loyalty Tags.

F2P Effectiveness: Low-Medium
F2P players find it difficult to maximize benefits due to limited troops and the difficulty of achieving large rallies.

Effectiveness for Spenders: Very High
P2P players can immediately utilize Troop & Rally Cap for PvP events, providing a significant strategic advantage.

skills.name: Call of War
skills.description: Provides 600 free high-level troops from the camp per day and 10 Loyalty Tags per day—potentially equivalent to 10,000 Gems of strategic value.

skills.name: Last Line
skills.description: Increases troop attack and defense by 10%, strengthening military power.

skills.name: Spirit of Aeetes
skills.description: Increases the lethality and health of all troops by 10%, strengthening the entire army.

skills.name: One Heart
skills.description: Increasing Rally Capacity by 100,000, supporting large rallies, especially for rally leaders.

dawn.name: Holger
dawn.description: Holger is an Arena expert with exceptional abilities in supporting performance in the arena.

talent.name: Blade Dancing
talent.description: Holger know the best rewards in the Arena are often won from the crowd. Holger's winsome techniques give 100% chance of audience reward: 3 Arena Star Chest's

dawn.summarize:
Focus: Arena (PvP tokens & hero stats)

Advantages:
Provides hero stat boosts, 50% more Arena Tokens, and Arena Shop discounts.

F2P Effectiveness: Medium
Token farming is limited by the number of tokens that can be collected for free.
F2P players can utilize stat boosts, but the benefits of the shop and tokens will be felt slowly.

Effectiveness for Spenders: High
Spenders can purchase additional tokens, utilize shop discounts, and maximize hero upgrades in the arena.

skills.name: Arena Elite
skills.description: Increases heroes' Attack and Health in the arena by 20%, strengthening their performance in duels.

skills.name: Crowd Pleaser
skills.description: A boost provided by a showman that increases daily and weekly arena token earnings by 50%.

skills.name: Arena Star
skills.description: strengthens arena shop rewards by offering three more items and a 50% discount.

skills.name: Legacy
skills.description: Includes the next generation of heroes with +20% Attack and Health, strengthening long-term power in the arena.
